website_summaries.verdict: The best car amplifier with a noticeable performance boost that you can buy at an affordable price.
pros: Improves volume, clarity, and dynamics without having to replace the speaker system
Can be controlled with included remote
Amplifier is easy to install and set up in most vehicles
cons: Amplifier can run a little hot after prolonged use

customer_reviews.title: Great amp. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this amp for 2 12" subs in a sealed box. This amp has plenty of power to make my subs hit really hard. With my old amp the headlights would dim when the bass hit but this amp cured that problem without adding a capacitor. Class D makes all the difference. Amp is barely warm after extended use. I just purchased another for my sons car .
customer_reviews.author: George J Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Excellent Power in a small Package
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for longevity, but I can say this is an excellent value. I have it pushing a single 12 inch Pioneer Champion Series sub (2 ohm DVC in series for a total 4 ohms) in a ported box. It is not even at half gain and pushes that speaker to its limit. The quality of the sound is great too. The amp is small, which is a good thing. 1 Con: the terminals. You insert the bare wire and then tighten the screw. No matter how hard you tighten, the larger power and ground wires can slip out. They will need secured close to the amp so they cannot be pulled out.
customer_reviews.author: JFK IITop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Pionner is the best
customer_reviews.text: If you want good sound U can't go wrong with pioneer. I am very happy I will recommend it to everybody...
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is has just been installed and boy does it slam. I will update if things change. A+ Update: So after the delivery and professional hookup on the 23rd, this amp is already going into protection loops at any volume. So sad too because the amp is seriously powerful. Cant believe its already having these issues. Not even 8 days...
customer_reviews.author: Penny Case

customer_reviews.title: Compact and powerfull sound
customer_reviews.text: as always pioneer one of the best brands in car audio and being perfectly in my mitsubishi lancer evolution with its compact size and faithful sound one of the best amplifiers I've had
customer_reviews.author: Hector M.

customer_reviews.title: Underrated power house!!!
customer_reviews.text: Runs two 10" JL Audio dual voice coils just fine. Amp is underrated so be careful, it WILL blow a single 10" sub if you're not careful, guess how I know... Remote is nice but nothing to write home about. Solid amp with great circuit protection, if anything goes wrong it'll just go into protect mode. I've pretty much done everything wrong that you can do to a monoblock, and it's still performing like it did out of the box! Like I said, it's an underrated amp, could easily push 2 12" dual coils without a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Veiny Brainy

customer_reviews.title: Install made simple with this amp.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this amp and a 10" subwoofer myself (never done it before) and this amp made the process much easier thanks to having hi-level inputs that can be tapped directly from the speaker wires from the head unit. Using the hi-level inputs also doubles as the "remote turn on" wire so that was a great help for someone who is new to installing this kind of thing. It works perfectly fine and I'm very happy with the purchase. I only added this amp and sub to my sound system, the rest was factory equipment. After turning down the bass from all other speakers it improved the sound of all other speakers as well. Was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beaumont

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Paired with the Pioneer preloaded flat 12 inch sub and works great. It's mounted in the trunk of a Ford Taurus SHO and gives the existing premium sound system that extra bass that was needed. This combo puts out more bass than most will need unless you are trying to announce your arrival 1/2 a mile away.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the look and performance of this amp. I wanted a mono amp to power two 10" skar subs and this amp worked out great. For basically $220, i bought two subs and an amp and built my own enclosure. I didn't want to spend a ton of money. This combo sounds really good. Amp comes with remote bass power controller as well so i can adjust the intensity of the bass at will.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Shineflew

customer_reviews.title: New audio for my S14
customer_reviews.text: Bought this amp to accompany a pioneer 10” compact sub for my S14. The amp is compact but powerful. I have it set very low because I’m looking for a more OE sound quality but I did stress test it after install to see how powerful is and I had to turn it off before it was to much. This think is small but mighty. Extremely satisfied with the whole set up.
customer_reviews.author: Sam McLean

customer_reviews.title: The unit did not last
customer_reviews.text: On April 23, 2017; I bought my Pioneer GM-8601 Class D Mono amp. The unit was installed about a month later. Here we are 21 months later and the amp no longer works. When I first installed it, it had great sound and it was very powerful. My problem is that this is my 3rd or 4th amp I have bought from pioneer that has lasted a short period of time. Of course is out of warranty and it's easier to buy a new one that have the old one fixed. The other ones lasted just over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all for 100-ish range
customer_reviews.text: Pushing 2 10s rates at 800rms.. thing knocks I been pushing hard month now no issues
customer_reviews.author: Uhdeman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: When I got this installed at a "professional" place, they used 8 gauge wire. Didn't last long. Switched to 4 gauge myself, and haven't had a problem since. This this is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Amp for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: I have this pushing a 12" Rockford Fosgate Punch P3 at 1 ohm, and this thing does not break a sweat! I am not currently using the bass knob. I just have the gain set to give the sub 600W RMS and it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: NorthshorecajunTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: It quits working.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for about two months. But now it only works when it wants to. I checked all the wiring and it is all done correctly. The gain option button is the one that seems to be broken. For what you’re spending look at the other high end brands because you get better quality for the same amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: QUIT EARLY WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Worst piece of crap ever. Just stopped working after 3 months wired properly at 1 ohm. Would cut out even when not hot, turns on and light is blue but does not work. The is unreal. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ElectroM@gnet

customer_reviews.title: Solid sound decent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Solid amp for the price. Between my sub and amp the sound is crisp and clean. I only have one gripe with the amp. The gain knob on my amp requires pressure for the amp to produce sound. I am not sure if this was caused from applying too much pressure to the knob when tuning my system, or if it came that way. My solution was to slide a fragment of plastic between the amp shell and gain knob. Moving past that it’s still kicking a year later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great amp for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: For the money you can't go wrong with Pioneer. Have used their products throughout the years. Had an Infinity mono amp that decided to burn up, so I replaced it with this one and so far I am not disappointed. RMS is strong pushes my Kappa subs with ease. I would recommend this amp.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Fuse Failure - Amp Fire
customer_reviews.text: This was installed professionally in my brand new 2018 Toyota Tundra and worked well for approximately 6 months before it almost set my truck on fire. I would like to return since the amp fuses failed and this is obviously a defective unit. Hopefully the seller touches base shortly...
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Berry

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but still great
customer_reviews.text: Great amp, I powered two 10inch pioneer 261d4 subs and it works great. The manual suggest 8 gauge wire but I would use 6 gauge less heat. Works awesome on 1 ohm
customer_reviews.author: Pawel

customer_reviews.title: Great amp at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Amp works great. Bought this to replace an old kenwood four channel that was powering my two 10" punch's. This amp really woke those subs up. It's very simple to set up and love the wired bass boost remote for easy tuning between different music styles and recording quality. Very affordable as well.
customer_reviews.author: mike fallon

customer_reviews.title: works very well at 4ohm
customer_reviews.text: no distortion as far as I can tell. I've only run it on 1 sub, but it doesn't get to hot when i really push it. When I'm pushing it 75% of max with a 4ohm impedance, it rattles a few parts of the car (rearview mirror, trunk). at 2ohms i'm sure this would rattle your whole car. I would not try it at 1ohm, even though it's advertised to perform there, because I've read so many reviews that say it overheated or broke or blew a fuse.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 months then stopped
customer_reviews.text: 2 months after install the Amp began cutting out. After a significant amount of troubleshooting it was clear the gain dial on the Amp is bad. If I press the gain dial in (it's not a button) then the Amp works fine. The moment, I let go, the Amp turns off. Since I can't return it and it's basically trash, I may open it and attempt to fix it. Overall though, I'm disappointed. It's very clearly a factory defect.
customer_reviews.author: flowjacked

customer_reviews.title: Buy new.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. You specify that it does not come with a remote food snob. But don't mention that it's missing the fuses. Ah.. wt**
customer_reviews.author: Kcaleb A Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Amp
customer_reviews.text: Can you say, bad a##! Got it hooked up on two 4 ohm a piece single voice coil Pioneer 10 TS-SW2502S4 in .6 cubic foot a piece in 2011 Silverado, they Rock!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Good amp but...
customer_reviews.text: The AMP is powerful and works with my Pioneer 10" sub perfectly. Only problem was the Amp control had scratches on it. Disappointed as it is the one thing that is in a visible location.
customer_reviews.author: Omi Nea

customer_reviews.title: Good amp
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this amp. Never got hot, powered our little alpine type s 10" like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome amp
customer_reviews.text: Excellent amplifier. I have this running a single Pioneer TS-W311D4 at 2 ohms and this thing is great. Hookup is a snap and does not get hot. The bass remote knob is convenient. I used KnuKonceptz 4 gauge wire to hook this in, which is the maximum gauge wire for this amp. Pioneer recommends a 100 amp fuse at the battery. It has two 40 amp fuses onboard. I am very happy with this amp.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a boat to push a Sony Explode 12" in a bandpass box, it pounds!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Broken when received
customer_reviews.text: I received it with a broken knob . I need someone to contact me about this ! I spent this money and I can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: High pitch ring emitted from amp on startup
customer_reviews.text: High pitch ringing sound coming from amplifier when it first powers on....every time you turn it on. This isn’t coming from the speakers as I’ve disconnected them to check, it’s definitely coming from the amp.... it’s does it for about the first 2 minutes it’s on then goes away? Not very happy about it
customer_reviews.author: janean vickman

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat it for the price. It produces enough power for complete audio experience. A side note, ENSURE you have a good ground connection!
customer_reviews.author: L G

customer_reviews.title: Gresat amp for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this for the price. Runs cool with alot of power. Currently I have it paired with the TSW310D4. Currently I have the gain turned all the way down and it still pushes. The best part is that it is small. Almost the size of a standard sheet of paper. I drive a Jeep commander with third row seats. I was able to mount this amp behind the third row of seats without modifying the spare tire jack storage area with no problem. When you look in the cargo area you can't even see it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last as long as I would have hoped
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my truck with 2 Fosgate 12's and it did great for about a year. Began to make the subs pop off and on at low volume, did that for about 3 weeks then completely blew up, smoking and all
customer_reviews.author: Colton Metzler

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product. I was expecting a little bit more thump out of it for my pioneer 1200 watts sub
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Olray Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer GM-D8601 Class D Mono Amplifier with Wired Bass Boost Remote
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed. its an awesome Amp for the money Great Value, Paired with Pioneer TS-SWX251 10" Flat Subwoofer in my Scion FRS, and is capable of producing more bass then I like, its not as loud as some bigger multi speaker subs might be but you have plenty of smooth clean bass in the small cabin of an FRS.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL ENGELE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound
customer_reviews.text: Perfect clean amp for sub. Clean good sound no noise just perfect all around
customer_reviews.author: steven undzilo

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer Amp
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, easy to install ... so the stereo person said
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: competition quality
customer_reviews.text: NEVER gets hot, not ever luke warm! I have this amp running a 10" Pioneer Champion Series woofer & it sounds amazing. I win bets all the time from people thinking I'm running something WAY larger than this unit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice amp. We are using on a 10" sub ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice amp. We are using this with a 10" subwoofer, sealed enclosure installed in a VW GTI, works great, plenty of power for this application. Fits under seat with full adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Erik T

customer_reviews.title: This words fine love it jus one problem I have with it ...
customer_reviews.text: This amp works fine.. love it jus one problem I have with it is that between 0-5 on the remote does nothing to the volume only after it then raises mayb this is something pioneer can sort out in the future but otherwise I'm very happy I bought this amp
customer_reviews.author: wade clarke

customer_reviews.title: great buy for the daily driver
customer_reviews.text: WOW, this is the real deal, have paired with 2 TS-W311D4, effn slams!!!! 1ohm load....great buy for the daily driver.....2004 GMC Yukon XL....
customer_reviews.author: Tony Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any problems with this amp. Great for my Rockford fosgate 12.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick pate

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound from this combination
customer_reviews.text: So far only an hour on the amp and subs. F150 Extended Cab. (2) 10 inch pioneer shallow mount subs and custom box. Amazing sound from this combination.
customer_reviews.author: musicman

customer_reviews.title: Bass for your face.
customer_reviews.text: Paired this with a Pioneer Ts-sw3002s4 12" in a custom box for my 03 Jeep Wrangler TJ. Pushes it with ease and sound great. I only have the gain turned to the middle, "normal" setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jake the real snake

customer_reviews.title: Solid amp
customer_reviews.text: Great little amp. Pushing a 12" R.F. p3 no problem. Gain set at 1/2 way and bumps.
customer_reviews.author: charles wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Pushing a pair of low profile MTX 12’s. Hits hard sounds great
customer_reviews.author: Steven Meyen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The amp works okay. I know its doing close to advertise wattage.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Akers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome amp for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome amp . It pushing 2 Fosgate p3’s running 1ohm. It Don’t get hot just warm
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Gain knob has made amp not work.
customer_reviews.text: Was a great amp. However, within the passed month or so the gain knob has been cutting out worse and worse, now the amp is a paper weight. Thought it would be a nice quality amp. Haven't been able to figure out wether I can return it or not either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer amp with 10in sub
customer_reviews.text: Running this amp at 4 ohms on a dvc 2ohm 10in alpine sub. Sounds amazing. Amp never gets hot. Love it. Perfect for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for buck. Stable at 1ohm, which is a nice perk and very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Navindra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing amp
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely impressed with this amp. Super clean power, great terminals, and makes 1 10 shake my entire car while sounding clean and neat. I used the knukonceptz 4 Gauge wiring kit, and everything worked out great. Absolutely pounds! I hooked it up to a Orion XTR104D, the best 10 I have ever heard, at 2 ohms, and was absolutely blown away. AMAZING AMP!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great intro priced amp
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this amp in my quad cab and it has been fantastic! It was easy to install and it paired quite nicely to some Kicker shallow mount 10" subs (4 ohm, 500 watt RMS) in a box under my rear seat. The included wired bass control is a very nice plus. Also, the amp looks good and has a small footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Fanning

customer_reviews.title: Great amp
customer_reviews.text: Hooked this amp up to an alpine swr 10d sub. Has great power to push the sub. Ran for 3 hrs straight with no overheating. Small and compact to put under a seat.
customer_reviews.author: Saltybeagle

customer_reviews.title: Great amp
customer_reviews.text: Strong, runs surprisingly cool, looks great, amazingly compact, easy to hook up, just a great amp so far. One thing I don't love is the control knob, when turned all the way down it doesn't cut the power completely. I like having the knob so I can drive in my neighborhood without bumping. But I have to turn the knob and turn the music down so as not to trudge up suspicion. But other than that just a great amp. One other thing is that my 4 gauge cable had to be snipped down to fit in the connectors. I still love it though! And the price is great for an amp like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen in Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Would buy again if needed
customer_reviews.text: I was originally concerned with going with pioneer for my amp. When it's all said and done, I don't regret it at all, everything works together perfectly! Paired with an alpine SWR-10D2! Love it! Would buy again if needed
customer_reviews.author: tclark

customer_reviews.title: Good amp for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Had one before that went out after two years. Good amp for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Narvel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great and it got here a day early love it it makes my kicker pound hard
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Franco

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: My brother has this system so i got it to and it’s amazing, i got it professionally installed so it looks good
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer amp 1600 watt
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with one amp as soon as they received my issue amp they had one to me next day love this amp better then kicker amp with same watt power.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend buying it new.
customer_reviews.text: Power gain adjustment was damaged when i got it. It work for about a month. Awesome sound when it worked. I should have brought new but i got it refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Little amp big Bass!!! Love it installed one pushing two shallow 12's in my 2014 Tundra and it bangs and sound crispy.
customer_reviews.author: Eduviges

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my single 10' in an sealed box.
customer_reviews.author: The great one

customer_reviews.title: Great amp, I've got this powering two pioneer TS-W311S4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great amp, I've got this powering two pioneer TS-W311S4 subs (1400 watts max, 450 nominal) and I love my setup!! This little thing can push some serious power. I was a little worried that it wouldn't be enough to power the two subs, but I was definitely wrong. I was going to upgrade to pioneer's 2400 watt amp, but having heard what this amp can do there's no need. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a solid amp that can push some power!!
customer_reviews.author: Zack Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome amp got it pushing my 12 in cerwin vega and its a hamm
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and inexpensive too.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this amp works wonderfully. The remote base boost is a big improvement over the previous model in this series. Also comes with two out puts, and an RCA output for hooking up a second amp. This is great for good, clean bass sound from your subs. Have a 10" JL Audio hooked up to this one, and another 10" hooked up to the previous model. It's unbelievable the sound I get out of such an inexpensive set of amps. They never even get warm. I would buy another one of these if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Lando C

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: This keeps up just fine wired to 1 ohm for a couple hours before it gets warm. Had no problems yet, it's been a month.

customer_reviews.title: I' match it with my Pioneer subwoofer works perfect thank
customer_reviews.text: I' match it with my Pioneer subwoofer works perfect thank you

customer_reviews.text: so far so good !! drove for an hour with my 10's turned up and there was no heat at all coming from this amp. no problem at all !!

customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this thing rocks! I can't even turn the gain all the way up!

customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. Good quality amp, clean power, handy bass boost knob. Running 2 10" Type-E subs in a ported box. Amp can handle deep lows without getting very warm at all running 2 ohms.

customer_reviews.title: awesome amp, bought 2 of them
customer_reviews.text: awesome amp , bought 2 of them !! 1 ohm load is a easy 750-800 rms true watt amp :)

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Plenty of power. Easy hook up. Small footprint. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: JoeFromGA

customer_reviews.title: Great Amp for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these in my '86 4runner with 2 Pioneer W3002D2 12's in a custom ported box. The amps put out every bit of what they are rated for and possibly a little bit more. Even after running the amps full volume for about an hour, they are hardly warm. I mounted both amps along with a Pioneer 4-channel on the back of my box and they look great as long you keep them clean. Unfortunately, that's sort of difficult with the glossy surface. The sound is pretty good too. You can buy better, but dollar for true watts, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Loper

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: The pioneer amplifyer exceeded my expectations. I have two 10" Rockford P2's running alongside it and the amp is not even on full blast. I'm afraid I may blow the subwoofers. Definitely worth the buy!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent amp, I have three 10's hooked up at ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent amp, I have three 10's hooked up at 1 ohm and my mirror looks like it might fall off! This things looks nice and is very inexpensive. Would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew E.

customer_reviews.title: It is very small and nice looking, I was surprised to find this much ...
customer_reviews.text: A very powerful amp. I'm using it with two double coil Pioneer Champion Series 12", 400W RMS each, and this amp makes some serious noise. It is very small and nice looking, I was surprised to find this much power for a small and low priced amp so I'm satisfied. The only thing I hate from this amp is that when I turn off the car, I can hear a click sound when it shuts off, it is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Montano

customer_reviews.title: ... amp with a 12" Kicker compVX and it a perfect match. Could not be any happier and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Pair this amp with a 12" Kicker compVX and it a perfect match. Could not be any happier and it works great at 1ohm if you wanted to wire it that way.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this amp because it could go as low as 1 ohm. I hooked it up to a new 12" JL Audio 2 ohm W3 in a sealed box and it sounds amazing. If I didn't know better I would think I had 3 subs in the trunk. I usually have to turn down the bass level on the deck because it get too loud. I love that at the level I play my music, that I never have to worry about pushing the amp or sub too hard. Great amp for a single sub application.
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's a simple but effective amplifier.
customer_reviews.text: Great amp, haven't tested it's true potential but it's a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Scott

customer_reviews.title: Solid Amp.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Manageable size, very straight-forward setup, and it's driving my sub nicely. (sub: Pioneer TS-SWX251 10" Flat Subwoofer with Enclosure)
customer_reviews.author: zachariah

customer_reviews.title: Great amp for the money
customer_reviews.text: This Amp does a awesome job for the size and price. I am very happy with the results! Great combination with the Pioneer Ts-sw3002s4 12". The combination is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pioneer GM-D8601 Class D Mono Amplifier with Wired Bass Boost Remote
product_meta.description: The extra-efficient Class-D digital amplifiers from Pioneer mark a dramatic improvement in power output Capability, yet are 50% smaller than the current gm-series Class-AB amplifiers. That makes them more versatile in terms of installation as well as performance.
